episode.title: Curtiss-Wright Corporation v. General Elec. Company

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition -- the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in No. 79-105, Curtiss-Wright Corporation against General Electric Company.

And for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed with the clerk, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit is vacated and the case is remanded for proceedings consistent with the Court's opinion filed today.
